description: Numbers n such that n+1 and 3*n+1 are perfect squares.
comments: It appears that a(n)=A046175(n)-A046174(n), that is, the triangular index of the n-th pentagonal triangular number minus its pentagonal index. - _Jonathan Vos Post_, Feb 28 2011
